001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidArgumentFunctionException;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.UriFunctionException;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyUriItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
025
026/**
027 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
028 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-resolve-uri">resolve-ur</a>
029 * functions.
030 */
031public final class FnResolveUri {
032  private static final String NAME = "resolve-uri";
033  @NonNull
034  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_ONE_ARG = IFunction.builder()
035      .name(NAME)
036      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
037      .deterministic()
038      .contextDependent()
039      .focusIndependent()
040      .argument(IArgument.builder()
041          .name("relative")
042          .type(IStringItem.class)
043          .zeroOrOne()
044          .build())
045      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
046      .returnZeroOrOne()
047      .functionHandler(FnResolveUri::executeOneArg)
048      .build();
049
050  @NonNull
051  static final IFunction SIGNATURE_TWO_ARG = IFunction.builder()
052      .name(NAME)
053      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
054      .deterministic()
055      .contextIndependent()
056      .focusIndependent()
057      .argument(IArgument.builder()
058          .name("relative")
059          .type(IStringItem.class)
060          .zeroOrOne()
061          .build())
062      .argument(IArgument.builder()
063          .name("base")
064          .type(IStringItem.class)
065          .one()
066          .build())
067      .returnType(IAnyUriItem.class)
068      .returnZeroOrOne()
069      .functionHandler(FnResolveUri::executeTwoArg)
070      .build();
071
072  private FnResolveUri() {
073    // disable construction
074  }
075
076  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
077  @NonNull
078  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeOneArg(
079      @NonNull IFunction function,
080      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
081      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
082      IItem focus) {
083
084    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> relativeSequence
085        = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
086    if (relativeSequence.isEmpty()) {
087      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
088    }
089
090    IStringItem relativeString = relativeSequence.getFirstItem(true);
091    IAnyUriItem resolvedUri = null;
092    if (relativeString != null) {
093      resolvedUri = fnResolveUri(relativeString, null, dynamicContext);
094    }
095    return ISequence.of(resolvedUri);
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Implements the two argument version of the XPath 3.1 function <a href=
100   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-resolve-uri">resolve-uri</a>.
101   *
102   * @param function
103   *          the function definition
104   * @param arguments
105   *          a list of sequence arguments with an expected size of 2
106   * @param dynamicContext
107   *          the evaluation context
108   * @param focus
109   *          the current focus item
110   * @return a sequence containing the resolved URI or and empty sequence if
111   *         either the base or relative URI is {@code null}
112   */
113  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UnusedPrivateMethod") // used in lambda
114  @NonNull
115  private static ISequence<IAnyUriItem> executeTwoArg(
116      @NonNull IFunction function, // NOPMD - ok
117      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
118      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext, // NOPMD - ok
119      IItem focus) { // NOPMD - ok
120
121    /* there will always be two arguments */
122    assert arguments.size() == 2;
123
124    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> relativeSequence = FunctionUtils.asType(
125        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0)));
126    if (relativeSequence.isEmpty()) {
127      return ISequence.empty(); // NOPMD - readability
128    }
129
130    ISequence<? extends IStringItem> baseSequence = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1)));
131    IStringItem baseString = baseSequence.getFirstItem(true);
132
133    if (baseString == null) {
134      throw new InvalidArgumentFunctionException(
135          InvalidArgumentFunctionException.INVALID_ARGUMENT_TO_RESOLVE_URI,
136          "Invalid argument to fn:resolve-uri().");
137    }
138    IAnyUriItem baseUri = IAnyUriItem.cast(baseString);
139
140    IStringItem relativeString = relativeSequence.getFirstItem(true);
141
142    IAnyUriItem resolvedUri = null;
143    if (relativeString != null) {
144      resolvedUri = fnResolveUri(relativeString, baseUri, dynamicContext);
145    }
146    return ISequence.of(resolvedUri);
147  }
148
149  /**
150   * Resolve the {@code relative} URI against the provided {@code base} URI.
151   *
152   * @param relative
153   *          the relative URI to resolve
154   * @param base
155   *          the base URI to resolve against
156   * @param dynamicContext
157   *          the evaluation context used to get the static base URI if needed
158   * @return the resolved URI or {@code null} if the {@code relative} URI in
159   *         {@code null}
160   */
161  @Nullable
162  public static IAnyUriItem fnResolveUri(
163      @NonNull IStringItem relative,
164      @Nullable IAnyUriItem base,
165      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
166    return fnResolveUri(IAnyUriItem.cast(relative), base, dynamicContext);
167  }
168
169  /**
170   * Resolve the {@code relative} URI against the provided {@code base} URI.
171   *
172   * @param relative
173   *          the relative URI to resolve
174   * @param base
175   *          the base URI to resolve against
176   * @param dynamicContext
177   *          the evaluation context used to get the static base URI if needed
178   * @return the resolved URI or {@code null} if the {@code relative} URI in
179   *         {@code null}
180   * @throws UriFunctionException
181   *           if the base URI is not configured in the dynamic context
182   */
183  @NonNull
184  public static IAnyUriItem fnResolveUri(
185      @NonNull IAnyUriItem relative,
186      @Nullable IAnyUriItem base,
187      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
188
189    IAnyUriItem baseUri = base;
190    if (baseUri == null) {
191      baseUri = FnStaticBaseUri.fnStaticBaseUri(dynamicContext);
192      if (baseUri == null) {
193        throw new UriFunctionException(UriFunctionException.BASE_URI_NOT_DEFINED_IN_STATIC_CONTEXT,
194            "The base-uri is not defined in the static context");
195      }
196    }
197
198    return baseUri.resolve(relative);
199  }
200}
